name: How to Plan your App
description:
NoCode Summer Camp WORKSHOP

Nocode.tech, Bravo Studio and me 🏕 Karla Fernandes, Bravo expert and UX/UI & Digital Product Designer showing you how to master app planning. ✨🤩


I have here a step-by-step planning process that will give the basics to build an app functionally prepared to succeed.


Step-by-Step App Planning workshop includes:

👉Define

👉Ideate

👉User Flows

👉Wireframes

👉Strategy


This event was exclusive for our campers, you won’t find this anywhere else. 😉


🎫 Want to be part of the camp?

Join for free here: https://www.nocode.tech/summer-camp


If you couldn't make it, don’t worry they will send you a link to the recording once the event is finished. <3


Workshop Created in partnership with Bravo Studio

http://onelink.to/bravovision
